definition: to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
to handle/to manage/to put in order/to arrange/to administer/to execute/to take action on/to plan

sentences.english: This initiative helped improve registration of births and deaths at the subdistrict level.
sentences.chinese: 这一举措帮助改善了街道一级的出生和死亡登记。

sentences.english: Not to oppose India's U N seat bid by China a welcome development.
sentences.chinese: 中国不反对印度入常是一个受欢迎的举措。

sentences.english: The British approach is equally bold.
sentences.chinese: 英国的举措也是同样大胆。

sentences.english: Efforts are now focused on preventing the spread of the parasites.
sentences.chinese: 防控举措如今集中在防止寄生虫的传播上。

sentences.english: Many Chinese agricultural initiatives are shrouded in mystery.
sentences.chinese: 中国在农业方面的诸多举措仍然充满了神秘色彩。
削减成本的举措已经在进行。

sentences.english: The European Commission proposed new measures to reform the European Union’s common agricultural policy.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲委员会提出改革欧盟共同农业政策的新举措。

sentences.english: Bank recapitalization is a key element in the World Bank Group’s response to the global financial crisis.
sentences.chinese: 充资是世行集团应对全球金融危机的一项主要举措。

sentences.english: Open schooling policy is a major measure for democratic management and honest party construction in colleges.
sentences.chinese: 校务公开是高校民主管理和党风廉政建设的一大举措。

sentences.english: The move aims to become the fourth plinth of symbol of contemporary art.
sentences.chinese: 这一举措旨在使第四柱基能成为当代艺术的代表符号。

sentences.english: The stricter approach is to begin next month in the preseason.
sentences.chinese: 此项更严厉的举措将在下月的季前赛里开始执行。

sentences.english: These measures had certain influences on the development of Buddhism in the time to come.
sentences.chinese: 刘裕的这些举措，对此后佛教的发展有一定的影响。

sentences.english: Qantas's move has already stirred up opposition from flight workers and unions.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲航空的举措已经引发了航空工人和工会的反对。

sentences.english: Epitomize the genering idea . the depict way of the text.
sentences.chinese: 概括本文的怠忽和描写举措。

sentences.english: Cultivating Educational Post Graduate is an important method for realising the specialization of teaching occupation.
sentences.chinese: 培养教育硕士是实现我国教师职业专业化的重要举措。

sentences.english: The manager hasn't worked out a suitable action to reduce the domino effect.
sentences.chinese: 经理还没有想出一个适合的举措来裁汰多米诺效应。

definition: to put into effect/to carry out
to officially launch (a policy, program etc)/to appear on stage/to appear publicly/(of a bar girl) to leave with a client
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
new policy/New Deal (Roosevelt's 1933 policy to deal with the Great Depression)
to declare one's position/to say where one stands
